website_summaries.verdict: Salon-quality results without spending hundreds of dollars.
pros: With the right developer and (sometimes) toner, this product will make even the darkest hair turn platinum blonde
cons: For the whitest shade of blonde, you may need to use 40 developer, which can make hair brittle

customer_reviews.title: Buy it from a beauty supply store, not here
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Wella Blondor in the past and its great. Very easy to bleach your hair with a lower volume developer. This... was not what I’ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Alderman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have dark brown, thick hair. I’ve been bleaching for years now with clairol. Some hair stylist friends recommended this because they said it would lighten better and do less damage. So I tried it. It didn’t lighten as good as clairol does (even though I used the 40vol wella developer, just like I always had) and burned the hell out of my scalp! Which I’ve never had a problem with before. It came out orange and not even my wella toner could fix it. I’m going to wait a bit then re-bleach with clairol. Very disappointed. Maybe it’s just my hair?
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: The best bleach
customer_reviews.text: By far the best bleach I’ve used to lift my dark hair up to the level I want. I use a toner after followed up with an olaplex treatment and it brings out a beautiful blonde! The picture is three weeks since I have done by hair. I upkeep with Fanola no yellow about once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than the color charm bleach
customer_reviews.text: This is actual purple bleach. Worked better than the color charm bleach. My hair lightened to lemon yellow with no red tones which is a miracle in itself. Took me from two rounds of bleach before toning to one! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Mrs W

customer_reviews.title: Will last a life time
customer_reviews.text: Picture are of the before, during and the last two are current. I started this process as quarantine fell upon us and I suddenly had much more time on my hands. I used the proper developers and mixed with this powder I really had little, if any, breakage. I must have bleached it more than 6 times by now, usually with baby lights for an accurate and even application, but my hair is still in tact. The correct toner and a really good post bleach hair treatment are also vital. I’m also only a little over halfway through the container and I over mixed the first few times.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Way better than buying little packets of bleach to mix.
customer_reviews.text: I have been bleaching my hair for several years now. I started off going to a salon but that gets expensive. (Disclaimer: if you’re trying to get platinum from dark hair, doing it in one setting will destroy your hair. Go to a salon.) I am by no means a professional, but I have learned through trial and error. I ordered this during the time of the pandemic and my usual stuff wasn’t available. I did use another brands developer, but it worked out well for me. The down side, I did have more breakage than usual but the bleach worked quick and effectively. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Color .
customer_reviews.text: Omg omg yes !! I was a little scared to do my hair at home but omg ! This is the best I have super dark brown hair and it’s long ! And let me tell you in less then an hour of this being in it lifted extremely well ! I usually pull very Brassie and when I pulled the foil off omg was it white ! Just what I wanted ! ... PS. I colored my hair with a box before ... the white strands you see is what this product pulled !
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach for blonding
customer_reviews.text: The pros recommend this and they're right. No, all bleach is not the same. This bleach, when used with Wella 20vol developer will take you to level 9 or 10. It's best to use Olaplex with it and you need to take time, don't be in a hurry! But my hair went ice white in one setting (had med brown hair). If you're really dark you may need 2, possibly 3 sessions at the max. Don't be in a hurry and combine Olaplex treatments and you'll get beautiful blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Good bleach
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t burn my scalp! Follow the instructions carefully. It doesn’t smell horrible either. Comes with a little scoop! Wear gloves. Add olaplex if you can. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Ribali

customer_reviews.title: Great product for blonde coloring
customer_reviews.text: This Powder is a very great product. I use it with the Sally beauty brand Vol. 20 developer. My cousin professional does my hair, but since I have moved states I decided why not let my fiancé color my hair? So, we followed the steps precisely as my hairdresser did them and it turned out just the same. You have to be very careful about how long you leave this on, because if you leave it on because your hair can easily get fried off. I would recommend this product, as long as you know how to properly use it.
customer_reviews.author: Robby F.

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: do not buy packets if you had long or dark hair. This is a great value and quality product. You will need a lot if you're a brunette trying to go blonde and stay that way. Don't be intimidated by doing your own hair. This is easy to use. Remember to mix completely!
customer_reviews.author: DesmondMiles

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It’s great for bleaching dark hair to platinum. It has a blue tone to it to help with avoiding pulling brassy colors when bleaching dark hair. I do usually have to tone my hair afterwards but not for long and sometimes can get away with just using purple shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: DasDick

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I've ever used for lightening hair. I use this on my own now, and this is a great way to get this product when my usual supplier is out of stock. Follow the directions, make sure it's at the right consistency, and you will be amazed at how well it works. I use Olaplex with it and do not have any damage issues, so I cannot speak as to damage that would occur without Olaplex. Buy this. Use it. Be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Zahas

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: After having this on my roots for 40 minutes (with a 40 developer), my hair looks like this. This was done at a hair salon, the stylist could not get my hair bleached. I have a lot of gray and mostly medium brown in the back. I used the other Wella lightener in the past and had great results. This stuff did not get it done after 40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Wim

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I bought this. Def helped during the pandemic and not having a Sallys to run too. I’ve used it twice and have barley made a dent in it. Comes with an accurate scooper.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good bleach overall
customer_reviews.text: I had dark dyed hair, I bleached it twice with this 2 weeks apart.. I used a 20 vol on my hair so I had to bleach twice.. so I'd recommend using a 30 vol developer for anyone wanting maximum results and I'd advise against bleaching dyed hair.. Unfortunately Any bleach will damage your hair.. But this bleach overall is the best I've used, it doesn't smell bad and it causes less damage but if you're looking for maximum lift on previous dyed hair this isn't the product for you just because you'd need 2 sessions and that's better done at a salon .. But for virgin hair this will lift probably in one bleach, great smell though.
customer_reviews.author: Reine A

customer_reviews.title: It's a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the money, it's a decent amount so if your only planing on doing one treatment, it be better to purchase a single packet. But it does as it says lift to a decent level will still recommend that you ger red color corrector if you are trying to go for the platinum Blond.
customer_reviews.author: caswolf

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for dying hair
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for dying hair. My only suggestion for anyone who orders this is if your hair is black you will have to do the process twice because sometimes the blonde doesn’t get as light as you may want like a platinum so if you are going for a very light blonde shade do the process twice take two days if you have two And make sure the hair is dry. It’s great value for the price. I make wigs I dyied mines yesterday I have to retouch some spots but overall I will show you guys below a picture hope you guys like if your interested in custom wigs email me at Eramirez118@outlook.com ❤️🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Lougee

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back to the cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: I will never go back to the cheap stuff, I'm in love with this stuff. I always used to use the cheap stuff from Sally beauty, never again. This stuff takes longer to process but it is so worth it, I didn't end up with the yellow color that I usually get and it didn't fry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: TessV84

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived open and exploded powder everywhere inside of package. Disappointed I paid $40 and can’t even use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bleach!
customer_reviews.text: The best bleach Ive ever used and I’ve been doing hair for 15 years! This has a nice Consistency once mixed, and it does have a very nice toner mixed in as well. Leaves hair feeling good and not straw or hay like afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: it keeps clutching when I try to chat

customer_reviews.title: Fake or old
customer_reviews.text: This product is either fake or old. I’ve tried lightening my hair a few times and each time it comes out orange when usually my hair lightens pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: I used this lightening powder along with Wella Koleston 40 volume developer and after 50 minutes my hair was only 3 levels lighter. This product is so weak and now I'll have to do another application just to get it light enough for me to tone. Very disappointed- the only good thing I can say is that it didn't smell awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than any other bleach I've used. I've been bleaching and dying my hair for over 10 years now and this is by far the simplest and best product I've ever used. Simple instructions and amazing results. It is well worth the money time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: Briegh Webber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lightener
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best lightener (bleach) I have ever used. I used with a 20 vol developer, and it lifted so beautifully! My hair normally turns very yellow when I lift, but with this, it didn't. I was so amazed. My hair also didn't feel damaged at all, which is extremely surprising.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: This lifted my 1b wig to a beautiful blonde with absolutely no orange tone. It went right past the brassy tone straight to blonde in 35 minutes. I did use a 40 cream developer. It seems to have a built in toner as evidenced by its bluish appearance. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Maayan Experience

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach!
customer_reviews.text: For me best bleach hands down. I have medium brown hair, (dyed it 4/5 months ago), and thin hair. I used 20 vol with the blondor all over for 45 min rinsed, T10 toner, then deep conditioned. My hair turned a nice blonde color not quite the lightness I wanted but after 1 application, cant complain. Because my hair is still healthy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Best bleach I have ever used. My hair didn't feel completely fried after use. *For reference I am Afro- Latina with 4a type hair.
customer_reviews.author: NiNA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this buy
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time buying bleach and I’m happy I did my research and wound up buying this one. I used it with L’Oréal 20 vol developer on my moms hair and went through with highlights. We honestly didn’t even need to tone it so the picture is just bleached. I wound up using about 5 scoops to highlight her whole head and there’s much more to go. It comes with a scooper which is helpful too
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: For at home bleaching, the only available product that won’t make hair orange.
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of using a regular (named something likeManic Panic) bleach/hair lighter. Hello brassy yellow and orange. Spent the extra $20 on this and I barely needed tonor (I still used it, but compared to previous results- this hair bleach is on another level. Don’t waste your time with anything else. You only have your hair health to lose !
customer_reviews.author: EMD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing job on my hair!!! Super pleased with this purchase! 🙏 now I just have to tone and it’ll look super pretty white blonde!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Shabel

customer_reviews.title: Great powder lightener for Level 10
customer_reviews.text: I purchased The Wella Blondor lightening powder after using an OTC lightener that only produced a level 7 (I wanted a level 10 for a Platinum shade). It worked great for me, and I used a 20-volume cream developer paying attention to timing the lift. Very easy to mix (pay attention to the directions) and easy to apply with applicator brush (thick...doesn't run).
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not for dark hair. I bleached my hair TWICE and the second round did NOTHING im now stuck with bits of blonde, ginger and black until i can get some diffeewnt bleach or pray to whoever that my hairdye works magic cuz i cant really go out like this. Im VERY upset!!!
customer_reviews.author: Squish squish

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fantastic, actually used it 3 times and my hair felt great. Minimal damage.. just the very ends of my hair need a tiny trim. Worked quick, no smell.. no dust.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lovecchio

customer_reviews.title: Bleach
customer_reviews.text: So I was always stuck on a certain brand and I thought it was good but after this I realized no it wasn't this stuff is amazing it has more product inside the container and it doesn't have a nasty scent Plus it actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I expected a smaller one and I was impressed with the greatness of the product, I recommend this purchase because it is of quality, large, good and at a lower price. I am delighted with my product, it is the best bleach I have used, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andreina Urbaneja

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: Great and faster results compared to my usual quick blue
customer_reviews.author: SMoKeY

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t damage my hair!!! 💖A+++
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this product!!! I have used before in an other country and now with the pandemic I decided to do my own hair. I am very satisfied, just following the instructions and everything was easy! My hair is not damage at all!! I used equal parts 1/1 but next time I will do 1/1.5 I highly recommend this to anyone who loves healthy hair!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for naturally dark hair.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I’ve always purchased bleach powder from Sally’s and because my natural color is so dark, I have to process for the full time and still get brassiness . I always end up having to do a 2nd highlight run. This stuff worked the first time and I only left it on for 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t light my natural hair color much compared with other powder bleaches that I used prior this one. My natural hair color is a light brown, and after I used this product, it come out orange.
customer_reviews.author: roxana tudorache

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightening
customer_reviews.text: I used this to lighten my hair from a dark brown to a level 8 in 3 sessions. It didn’t seem to cause too much damage. I really like Wella products.
customer_reviews.author: flyingnimbus2001

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is one of many bleach products I have tried over the last few years. Really like this one: doesn't burn, didn't smell too bad ( it's bleach, you know it's going to smell a little), had good lift and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey C.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, FAST shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in PERFECT condition! Great deal especially for the quantity and quality!
customer_reviews.author: xX8081

customer_reviews.title: Great product for professionals
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for what I paid .. love this lightener
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Used it once on a strand so far went well
customer_reviews.text: As of right now love the color that it goes to even without toner. Ps my hair is ombré roots are natural about 3-5 in and the rest is pretty ashy blonde it’s hard to match hair color but the strand test so far hasn’t turned horrible I’ll update when I complete full head
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Quality bleach powder that packs a punch.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, gives a lot of lift. Went from dark brown to level 9 blonde in two attempts spaced out over two weeks using only 20 vol developer and Olaplex 1 & 2 so my hair was protected as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Tomassini

customer_reviews.title: not as great as claimed
customer_reviews.text: This did not lift my hard to lift hair. Regular Bleach they sell at Sally's did a better job, save your money! Do not buy if you have hard to lift hair. Didn't help me at 40 volume like cheaper Sally's bleach did.
customer_reviews.author: kristine  Lund

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I have dark, almost black hair. This lightener worked fast and didn't damage my hair.
customer_reviews.author: ADavis

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good value!
customer_reviews.text: Combined with the bottle of loreal oreor developer I had, it worked amazingly. It bleached my virgin black hair really well and the health of my hair wasn't terribly impacted.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bleach!
customer_reviews.text: So this product lifted my hair incredibly with the 30 vol developer. I finally got the platinum blonde I've been looking for with very minimal hair damage. Didnt have any issues with orange tones at all however my haor had already been lightened a bit and is light brown naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Raye

customer_reviews.title: Strong by the first time!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Be sure to select the right volume of activator and don’t go more than 20-25 mins your first time. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmopeach

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good thing it has no scent so it’s not as strong when mixed with developer. It works really quick so I suggest u start with the tips then let sit for a bit the head on and work on the roots .
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: A great hair bleach!
customer_reviews.text: The bleach is great! It pulls color out quick and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Landa

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: When you're gonna bleach hair, put the price in the product. Only had to process twice versus 3 times with cheaper bleach powder brand. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flav

customer_reviews.title: Works kinda
customer_reviews.text: This lightened my hair but also it didn’t make it blonde. It made it orange, even though I followed instructions and toned it
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: D not use if you're bleaching your hair for the first time!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely for the people who actually know what they're doing when it comes to lightening hair. I do not, BUT I was still very impressed with how quickly the product worked and with how light my hair turned out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Best hair color remover out there!
customer_reviews.text: Got alll the black color out of my hair no problem what so ever after trying every other thing in the book!
customer_reviews.author: KELLIE FLEMING

customer_reviews.title: Went form Pravana Purple (faded) to a nice golden natural looking blonde after I toned it
customer_reviews.text: Went form Pravana Purple (faded) to a nice golden natural looking blonde after I toned it. Best bleach I've ever used, doesn't smell wicked either.
customer_reviews.author: ashley wilson

customer_reviews.title: found cheaper later
customer_reviews.text: good product, wife is happy. but then she found a cheaper one nearby and man....
customer_reviews.author: B. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it... the product worked well did its job and the price was awesome... grant I didnt keep my hair blonde/bleached I added color to it but for the day or so that it was blonde it was awesome
customer_reviews.author: Falyn

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This lightener is fantastic. Takes my hair to platnum nicely in
customer_reviews.author: Sunsprite

customer_reviews.title: great bleach.high ranked
customer_reviews.text: Blondor..what can i say..its bleach and it works!already has an anti yellowing in it.good product.its 28 oz so can use many times.i googled the best bleach and this popped up.glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had a chance to try this yet but wanted to review that it showed up completely broken and product falling out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Joe & Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lifts well
customer_reviews.text: Lifted my far brown hair really well. Way better than anything I bought at Sally’s. Not as harsh fume wise and left my hair feeling not as damaged. Great size container for the price. Will last me and my bf a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Overton

customer_reviews.title: Use the product properly to get the desired result.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, make sure to measure properly and mix well. I like the way the product applies. Full head of shoulder length hair requires 4 50 mL scoops of the powder individually mixed in a 1:2 ratio with developer as is the max in the directions on bottle. Make sure to apply thick and even, works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mickayla

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a dream
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the extra money because it's gentler on your hair. Considering the abuse I put mine through my hair didn't brake off. That been said, you still need to follow instructions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Cirs

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use , great quality and no strong odor .
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dark brown to blonde in one treatment, I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Not amused
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it the container was cracked on the bottom and powder in the Amazon box I haven't been able to find a tear in the packaging though
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: So far the best lightener I've usded for my very dark hair.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great and no damage
customer_reviews.text: Lightened without damaging my hair. I used another brand recently and my hair is completely fried. I wish I had just stuck with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The only one that works for my stubborn hair. Gives professional effect
customer_reviews.author: Mafi

customer_reviews.title: It did what bleach does
customer_reviews.text: I do not like belaching my hair but it is a necessary evil when going a crazy color. This stuff did the jerb.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bleach and damages hair very little
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bleach and damages hair very little. I went from very dark brown virgin hair to almost pale ash blonde after 3 bleach sessions (wait a while in between sessions).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Container shows up broken but bleach is perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: I love this bleach I use it for my roots all the time since I couldn’t get it at the store because of quarantine I bought it here .... the bleach itself is fine but beware the container might show up broken open your package with an extra ziplock bag to put it in
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for me because I highlight my own long ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for me because I highlight my own long hair regularly and with many years experience THIS item far exceeds any others and will last over a year using it monthly. Will be buying more to stick up in the event it becomes unavailable
customer_reviews.author: turkoizharley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look new
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, it doesn't look new, the package inside of the container was just the powder wrapped in an OPEN plastic bag with a clip on it. Secondly, this did not work too great on my hair, My hair was at level 6-7, and after two times of using this product, my hair got to 8-9. Good side of it is that it didn't damage my hair that much.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: 7 lift level
customer_reviews.text: this is a 7 lift level. had to use with 40 developer.
customer_reviews.author: missveeSanFran

customer_reviews.title: Professional Product Tones While Bleaching
customer_reviews.text: The only brand my stylist of 20 years would use - was glad to be able to get as the purple shade it turns helps to tone.
customer_reviews.author: Jules66

customer_reviews.title: I used a 30volume with this lightener
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t too strong of lightener, it lifted my dark brown hair to a pretty light blonde. Level 8-9. I would highly recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT WITH MY 4C HAIR
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain about this purple powder. I've only used two brands so far. This one and the ion brand. I switched to this brand bc they offer more since I bleach my hair a lot (baldie).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: legit bleach
customer_reviews.text: I love wella blondor bleach! It is always my go to. I lift to a pale yellow using 20 volume after 30 minutes, coming from brunette hair
customer_reviews.author: Yasss qweeen

customer_reviews.title: Wella Blondor
customer_reviews.text: Ordering and delivery was very easy and perfect. I have dark hair so this didn’t get as light as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it to lighten the hairs on my hands and legs, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous highlights. You'll still need to tone a bit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect blonde. You'll still need to tone but not as much
customer_reviews.author: Holly Golightly

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this bleach, my hair never turns out brassy & there’s no loud chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyBabe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My hair turned out great and was surprisingly hardly damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product was as promised and I received it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a wig designer and I often do custom color, this bleach prevents me from having to use a toner in most situations. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: jazzmin perry

customer_reviews.title: Orange hair
customer_reviews.text: This turned my hair bright orange! I've been bleaching my hair for over a decade and have never had my hair turn this color. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best out there
customer_reviews.text: Have long very curly hair and used this to get me from a light brown to blonde with minimal damage. Love and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: emily dos santos

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: It turned my hair bright orange.. it was suppose to go lighter blonde instead but it did the opposite. This is a complete waste of money and worse of all it made my hair worse.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hair lightening product! Quality stuff... i am platinum blonde thanks to this product
customer_reviews.author: KVonHolten

customer_reviews.title: Hair did not lighten at all
customer_reviews.text: I used 30 vol developer with this and it still didn't lighten — bleached three times to try to get to a level 10 even though I started at a level 6. Been staying at level 8. Not a fan of this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zainab Javed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and dark brown hair, it didn't turn orange nor damaged my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Works quicker than normal bleaching in hair
customer_reviews.text: Went blonde and this definitely got all the dark color out
customer_reviews.author: Kareena

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my hair
customer_reviews.text: It damaged my hair like no other bleach has. AND I ONLY USED 20 VOLUME THATS CRAZY I WILL NEVER PURCHASE again. Best Bleach Quick Blue from L'Oréal
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Casillas

customer_reviews.title: The blonder the better!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I expected the smell not to be great so I don’t want to really complain about that. But I was asked for a scent rating so I gave it.
customer_reviews.author: Williams Caraveo

customer_reviews.title: Back to White
customer_reviews.text: I have black Asian hair and this was able to bleach it to near-white in three processes (toned using Fanola No Yellow Shampoo)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonM

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Slightly overpriced for what the product is worth but I also understand the lack of availability and the price increase due to the global pandemic. The product itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Szegda
